ashah766.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • ashah766.shapes.Shape
      • ashah766.shapes.Shape2D
        • ashah766.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape2D
    RegularPolygon can be used to model the properties and features of a regular polygon. Calculations such as area, perimeter, and angles are available, and the polygon can be drawn to a PApplet
    Version:
    10-12-18
    Author:
    Atharva Shah

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ashah766.shapes.Shape

        x1, y1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Draws a triangle with side length 100 with 250,250 as the centerpoint
      RegularPolygon(int n, double s)
      Creates a regular polygon with the first vertex at 250,250

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Draws a triangle with side length 100 with 250,250 as the centerpoint

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int n,
                      double s)
        Creates a regular polygon with the first vertex at 250,250
        Parameters:
        n - number of sides. If n is negative, it draws the polygon counter-clockwise from the starting point
        s - side length
        Precondition:
        absolute value of n should be greater than or equal to 3

    • Method Detail

      • calcr

        public double calcr()
        Returns radius of inscribed circle
        Returns:
        double value representing radius

      • calcR

        public double calcR()
        Returns radius of circumscribed circle
        Returns:
        double value representing radius

      • calcVertexAngle

        public double calcVertexAngle()
        Calculate the the interior vertex angle between two sides. In a regular polygon, all vertex angles will be the same
        Returns:
        double value representing vertex angle.

      • getNumSides

        public double getNumSides()
        Returns:
        number of sides

      • getSideLength

        public double getSideLength()
        Returns:
        length of each side

      • drawBoundingCircles

        public void drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Method that draws two circles; one circumscribed around the polygon, and one inscribed inside.
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet to draw the bounding circles on

      • getCenterPoint

        public double[] getCenterPoint()
        Method for finding the centerpoint
        Returns:
        centerpoint as a double array. First element is x-coordinate, second element is y-coordinate
